mesquite.lib

Class RandomBetween

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • mesquite.lib.RandomBetween
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RandomBetween
extends java.util.Random
    subclass of Random to return random integer between min and max inclusive.
    See Also:
